page.title: 11COUNTESTHORPE - SHOPS
page.content: We think that most shops in Countesthorpe are fairly good. Countesthorpe has got two take-away food shops; one is a normal chipshop and the other is a chinese take-away. We think that this is a good thing to have in Countesthorpe because it saves you going to other villages to get a ready cooked meal. The other shops we use are the newsagents and the off-licence. We like these shops because they sell sweets,magazines and cards. We also have a bike shop which is cheap. Bikes get repaired on time and they have a wide range of accessories.The post-office is quite good in our eyes but it has been improved with a store next to it which is cheap.
